Isp Accepts Liability For Content

11 Jun 1999

The BBC report that Demon Internet have failed to lodge an appeal against the libel case which judged that Demon were responsible for material sent through their servers (read the article here).

Demon - Britain's biggest traditional ISP - dropped the appeal, saying that an appeal could affect "the entire ethos of freedom of speech on the Internet."
